title: Up
brief_description: A beautifully photographed non-narrated depiction of a hang glider’s majestic flight through the Rocky Mountains, Sierra Nevada and Alaskan mountain peaks - whose journey sees him pick up a young hitchiker, but fateful end is witnessed solely by a lone eagle. Winner of Academy Award for Live Action Short Film.
